mapper.insert: INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, USERNAME, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDREF) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, BOARD_SEQ.CURRVAL)

INSERT INTO QNA (BOARDNUM, USERNAME, BOARDTITLE, BOARDCONTENTS, BOARDREF, BOARDSTEP, BOARDDEPTH) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{userName}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, (SELECT BOARDREF FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM = ${boardNum}), (SELECT BOARDSTEP+1 FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM = ${boardNum}), (SELECT BOARDDEPTH+1 FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM = ${boardNum}))
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET BOARDSTEP = BOARDSTEP+1 WHERE BOARDREF = (SELECT BOARDREF FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM = ${boardNum)) AND BOARDSTEP > (SELECT BOARDSTEP FROM QNA WHERE BOARDNUM = ${boardNum})
UPDATE QNA SET BOARDTITLE = #{boardTitle}, BOARDCONTENTS = #{boardContents} WHERE BOARDNUM = #{boardNum}
UPDATE QNA SET BOARDHIT = BOARDHIT+1 WHERE BOARDNUM = #{boardNum}
